title: Dell's New XPS 12 Is a Surface Clone With a Keyboard You'll Actually Want to Use
text:
Dell's New XPS 12 Is a Surface Clone With a Keyboard You'll Actually Want to Use 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Dell has just announced a new Windows 2-in-1 tablet computer called XPS 12, which uses a series of magnets to turn into a laptop, along with...
